# This file is managed by Puppet. Do not edit manually.
# Coralogix agent configuration generated by Puppet
private_key: <%= @coralogix_api_key.unwrap %>
region: <%= @coralogix_region %>
applicationName: <%= @coralogix_application_name %>
subsystemName: <%= @coralogix_subsystem_name %>

<% if @coralogix_logs_enabled && !@coralogix_log_files.empty? -%>
logs:
<% @coralogix_log_files.each do |name, path| -%>
  - name: "<%= name %>"
    file: "<%= path %>"
<% end -%>
<% end -%>
<% if @coralogix_metrics_enabled && !@coralogix_jmx_metrics.empty? -%>
metrics:
  - name: "Cassandra JMX Metrics"
    type: "jmx"
    endpoint: "<%= @coralogix_jmx_endpoint %>"
    select:
<% @coralogix_jmx_metrics.each do |metric| -%>
      - "<%= metric %>"
<% end -%>
<% end -%>
